data.name: Copy Kitty OST
data.detailed_description:
42 Original Songs composed by Azure. Many of the songs are special mixes that feature the different variations heard in-game. For additional commentary on the tracks from the composer, please check the soundtest in-game!

Instructions on how to access the MP3 files:
1. Right-click Copy Kitty in your Steam Library and select Properties
2. Go to the Local Files tab and select "Browse Local Files"
3. Open the MP3 Folder

MAIN:
01 Melon Microchip
02 Tangerine Tachyon+Titanium
03 Blackberry Bytecode+Bossbattle
04 Cherry Chenopod+Charcoal
05 Raspberry Reaction+Radiance+Recycling
06 Durian Domination+Denouement
07 Grape Grotto+Grapple+Gravity
08 Papaya Pachyderm+Pajamas+Periscope
09 Cranberry Crisis+Crusader+Crackdown+Crossbow
10 Starfruit Samurai
11 Banana Bastion+Borealis+Blazar
12 Banana Boombox
13 Pineapple Paladin+Peril+Plasma
14 Physalis Phrost+Phoenix1
15 Physalis Pharaoh+Phoenix2
16 Tangerine Trepidation
17 Tangerine Takedown+Tremor
18 Melon Magic+Mouse+Machine
19 Blueberry Bubble+Bellflower+Bladesmith+Blastfurnace
20 Cherry Chaos+Cellphone
21 Watermelon Waterway+Warmachine
22 Durian Dementia
23 Cherry Chainsaw
24 Physalis Photon
25 Peach Parallax

SPOILER: Endgame tracks that are best played after beating the game.
26 Banana Blight+Blessing
27 Durian Darkness
28 Durian Deity
29 Dragonfruit Deadlock
30 Tangerine Tenacity
31 Dragonfruit Doomsday
32 Strawberry Smooch
33 Strawberry Stampede
34 Nectarine Nightmare

NES REMIXES: 8-bit chiptunes not used in the game.
35 Melon Microchip (NES remix)
36 Raspberry Reaction (NES remix)
37 Banana Bastion (NES remix)
38 Durian Domination (NES remix)
39 Grape Grapple (NES remix)
40 Cranberry Crusader (NES remix)
41 Pineapple Paladin (NES remix)
42 Tangerine Takedown (NES remix)
